title: Will This Ironman Triathlon Über-Trainer Transform Pro Cycling?
content:
Olav Aleksandr Bu, the pioneer of 'double threshold’ and coach of Blummenfelt and Iden, will join Uno-X this winter. Can he change cycling training methodology?

Read the full article at Will This Ironman Triathlon Über-Trainer Transform Pro Cycling? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
